data.message: Is there a way to wipe all your past posts from your timeline in one easy step?  I would like the stuff yo be gone without having to do it one by one or having to start a whole new fb account.

replies.message: Hi Shawn. While we don't currently offer the ability to delete all past posts from your timeline at once, we are always working to improve your Facebook experience. Please feel free to let our team know more about your suggestion in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2mb46JS. -Anna
